Synopsis: Returns the full name of the input object's type, as well as the name of the types it inherits from, recursively until System.Object.
Description: Returns the full name of the input object's type, as well as the name of the types it inherits from, recursively until System.Object.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Expand-PSMDTypeName -InputObject "test"
Returns the typenames for the string test ("System.String" and "System.Object")
